Radius protocol is not routed through management interface. If Radius is in use, it is recommended to use mangement interface for Radius communication
Tacacs+ protocol is not routed through management interface. If Tacacs+ protocol is in use, it is recommended to use mangement interface for Tacacs+ communication
Syslog protocol is not routed through management interface. It is recommended to use mangement interface for sending syslog.
SNMP Traps are not routed through management interface. It is recommended to use mangement interface for sending SNMP Traps.
FTP, TFTP, SCP protocols are not routed through management interface. It is recommended to use mangement interface for FTP, TFTP, SCP communication
NTP communication is not routed through management interface. It is recommended to use mangement interface for NTP communication
